CustomField.description: This field is optional. It is the picklist that specifies the type of distribution for a Coverdell Education Savings Account (CESA).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies the type of distribution for a Coverdell Education Savings Account (CESA).
CustomField.label: CESA Distribution Type

value.fullName: Distributions - Transfer to CESA of same Designated Beneficiary
value.label: Distributions - Transfer to CESA of same Designated Beneficiary

value.fullName: Distributions - Transfer to CESA of new qualified designated beneficiary
value.label: Distributions - Transfer to CESA of new qualified designated beneficiary

value.fullName: Distributions - Transfer to former spouse's CESA due to divorce or legal separation
value.label: Distributions - Transfer to former spouse's CESA due to divorce or legal separation

value.fullName: Correction of Excess Contribution in same year as excess contribution
value.label: Correction of Excess Contribution in same year as excess contribution

value.fullName: Correction of Excess Contribution in year after excess contribution but by May 31
value.label: Correction of Excess Contribution in year after excess contribution but by May 31

value.fullName: Correction of Excess Contribution after May 31 of the tax year after excess contribution
value.label: Correction of Excess Contribution after May 31 of the tax year after excess contribution
